title: A Login Queue!?
body:
Not in a million years did I think I'd live to see the day I had to wait a login queue on OCE.

EDIT: S'all good now folks.

replies.body:
We're looking into issues with logging in and the client now - thanks for the report!

[We'll keep this thread updated with updates.](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/9rNOyg9Q-login-issues-and-client-disconnection-02022016)
i was rank over 9000... -_- and then i went to 1 and was stuck on 1%
What's the happend for rank?
Reset.
I'm in a queue of over 9000?? Wow Jhin must be popular!
Rito are just a bunch of turbo-memers deep down
I had some weird client bugs gong on so i restarted the client. May be that it was happening to everyone, and so a bunch of people reset at the same time

Tried to close it after this, and went up to 3000 lol
[IMG]http://i68.tinypic.com/30m73w5.jpg[/IMG]
at least your position aint 602 lol
Sup dude! its not working for u either eh?
Lol it wont even connect to server now. So good of a server ;) someone ddos'n?

It's over 9000! [](https://gyazo.com/72c88a5e06661b6ad5efc48e2d232a32)

Lmao over 9000, wtf.
yo wassup bro, yeah lol won't work for me either, but lucky its dinner time, hopefully back up and running by the time I'm finished
i was No.1
Whats going on? Im agitated
WHAT IS HAPPENING? CLEANED THE HOUSE SO FAST SO I CAN PLAY. WAT DO? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
im in thank god for that, but ranked is down fml how long on ranked queues?

> [{quoted}](name=iWiLlBrEaKyOu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qfvulJhy,comment-id=0030,timestamp=2016-02-02T05:58:59.958+0000)
>
> im in thank god for that, but ranked is down fml how long on ranked queues?

Later
When will rank be enabled again?
you know the funny thing ? I am on number one for last 15min -_-' and it says now approx. wait time 1sec, {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} dafaq going on
It's a sign ! Go do your chores now

Is this a Dbz Reference..over 9000
{{champion:32}}
I'm in lads!
NOO, just had a long day at work. Now all i want to do is kill this new Djinn dude. Gummon{{item:3070}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3070}}
thank god
IM IN BOIS

> [{quoted}](name=ning1000,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qfvulJhy,comment-id=001f,timestamp=2016-02-02T05:53:15.984+0000)
>
> IM IN BOIS

are u sure?

RANKED IS DISABLE DOE
{{item:3070}}
YES IM IN
My queue reached position 1, waited 4 mins and still wasn't put in
im 9000 in queue gg
my position in queue was 2987 and then the server couldnt connect so i restarted the client and now im over 9000 in queue
ive been position 1 in the queue for like 10mins
i'm in and its working :)
http://postimg.org/image/f1pfu7lst/
My position is over 9000!!!!! :) ohhh baby
Nerf login or rito
Maybe some part of the new update caused some sort of queue bug, and kicked us all out and put us in a perma login queue.
Now I'm getting server didn't respond or connect

> [{quoted}](name=Just a yasuo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qfvulJhy,comment-id=001e,timestamp=2016-02-02T05:52:20.034+0000)
>
> Now I'm getting server didn't respond or connect

What happened to dinner? :')
Please fix the servers or else my mum will smack me.

Well I got up to number 1 in the queue....
Then suddenly the timer went back up to 30 minutes
So noone else can get on either?

All of a sudden nothing would load, the summoner icons/champion mastery points etc etc. so i quit the client (mistakes were made) to re-set it, and now i am put the the queue at 556th place, waited for the timer to go to zero, as soon as it did it reset, and it said 4 minutes, then again for 6....

Well I got up to number 1 in the queue....
Then suddenly the timer went back up to 30 minutes
So everyone else can't get on either?

Im not even getting a place, just getting "Logging On".
Comeon, cant play LoL after school :(
Im so keen to cancel and retry but they might make me go back and do it again
Just cancell, mine wont even connect to server since i stopped it. So probaly a server reset..
lmao I was 1st in queue.
Yeah I'm at like 602 position
7th here
